          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical reactions in open air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Reaktionen in der geöffneten Luft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réactions chimiques en air ouvert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reações químicas no ar aberto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazioni chimiche in aria aperta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημικές αντιδράσεις στην ύπαιθρο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacciones químicas en aire abierto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an increase in mass of the product of the reaction of mercury to produce mercury oxide in open air.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mercury</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mercury oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">open air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Zunahme der Masse des 
Produktes der Reaktion des Quecksilbers zum Erzeugnisquecksilberoxid 
der geöffneten Luft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une augmentation de la 
masse du produit de la réaction du mercure à l'oxyde de mercure de 
produit en air ouvert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um aumento na massa do 
produto da reação do mercúrio ao óxido do mercúrio do produto no 
ar aberto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un aumento nella 
massa del prodotto della reazione di mercurio all'ossido del mercurio 
dei prodotti in aria aperta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια αύξηση στη μάζα του 
προϊόντος της αντίδρασης του υδραργύρου στο οξείδιο υδραργύρου 
προϊόντων στην ύπαιθρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un aumento en la masa 
del producto de la reacción del mercurio al óxido del mercurio del 
producto en aire abierto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quecksilber</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quecksilberoxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">öffnen Sie Luft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
